privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introText: We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data.
privacy.toProvide: To provide and maintain the service
privacy.encryptionText: All data is encrypted in transit (HTTPS) and at rest
privacy.firebaseText: We use Firebase to store data securely
privacy.backupsText: Regular backups are made of your data
privacy.retentionText: We keep your data as long as your account is active. Upon deletion, we remove all data within 30 days.
privacy.cookiesText: We only use necessary cookies for authentication and session.
privacy.onlyFirebase: We only use Firebase as a third-party service
privacy.childrenText: Our service is not for children under 18 years old
privacy.changesText: We will notify you of any changes via email

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.byUsing: By using Log & Ledger ('the Service'), you agree to these terms
terms.toolOnly: Log & Ledger is a software tool, NOT:
terms.organization: Tools to Organize Your Financial Data
terms.dataAccuracy: Akurasi semua data yang Anda masukkan
terms.noWarranty: We provide the service 'as is' without warranties
terms.terminationText: We may terminate your account for violating these terms. You can close your account at any time.
terms.ipText: All software rights remain with us. Your data remains yours.
terms.modificationsText: We reserve the right to modify the service or these terms. We will notify you of major changes.
terms.lawText: These terms are governed by the laws of Dubai, United Arab Emirates
terms.disputeText: Any disputes are resolved through arbitration in Dubai
terms.severabilityText: If any provision is unenforceable, the remaining provisions remain in effect
terms.entireText: These terms constitute the entire agreement between us
terms.pageNotFoundDesc: Did you forget to add the page to the router?
